ofSketch

This week is all about getting up and running with ofSketch. Make sure you have Xcode installed to ensure ofSketch will run properly. We will be referencing ofBook at times -- you can easily find relevant chapters here.

assignment

read electric speed

Work on your ofSketch exercises. Spend a few hours experimenting with the environment. Build on what we covered in class. Use the openFrameworks documentation to discover some things this platform has to offer. Your exercise for this assignment can be one sketch or multiple test-sketches.
